translation.en: [young man] I didn't really have your typical upbringing.
translation.zh: 我并不是像你们那样在正常环境下长大

translation.en: I mean, I did at first, but then the world ended.
translation.zh: 开始时倒还正常 但后来世界毁灭了

translation.en: I don't think anyone was really shocked.
translation.zh: 我觉得大家都还算淡定

translation.en: We always thought it might, and then it just finally happened.
translation.zh: 这种事我们一直都有预感只是终于发生了而已

translation.en: But how it happened, now that's where it gets interesting.
translation.zh: 但究竟如何发生的才是比较有趣的部分

translation.en: Agatha 616.
Yep, an asteroid heading straight for Earth.
translation.zh: 没错 一颗直冲地球的小行星就叫这名字

translation.en: I know. So obvious.
translation.zh: 我知道 看名字就猜得出来

translation.en: So, humanity came together, and we did what we do best.
translation.zh: 于是 全人类同心协力我们尽了最大的努力

translation.en: We shot a bunch of rockets at it! And we blew it up! And it was great!
translation.zh: 我们向它发射一波火箭！它被炸掉了！简直太棒了！

translation.en: But it wasn't. You see, the thing that makes rockets rockets--
translation.zh: 但世事难料 造火箭的那些东西

translation.en: chemical compounds, a lot of 'em.
Which rained back down on us, and everything changed.
translation.zh: 像雨点般落回地球 把一切都改变了

translation.en: And by "everything," I mean cold-blooded creatures.
translation.zh: 我说的“一切” 其实就是冷血动物

translation.en: And by "changed," I mean mutated and started eating us to death.
translation.zh: 我说的“改变”就是它们变异了而且开始吃人

translation.en: Ants, lizards, roaches, crocodiles. You name it. There's a lot of 'em.
translation.zh: 蚂蚁、蜥蜴、蟑螂、鳄鱼…应有尽有 数不胜数

translation.en: I knew this one kid who was eaten in his sleep by a goldfish he won at a carnival.
translation.zh: 我认识一个小孩 在睡梦中被他在狂欢节赢得的金鱼吃掉了

translation.en: -[growls] -Man, Todd loved that goldfish.
translation.zh: 我认识一个小孩 在睡梦中被他在狂欢节赢得的金鱼吃掉了 天啊 托德真的很喜欢那条金鱼

translation.en: And that cat.
So, for most of human history, if you wanted to kill a cockroach,
translation.zh: 在大多数人类历史中如果我们想弄死一只蟑螂

translation.en: all you needed was a shoe.
Well, suddenly you needed a shotgun.
translation.zh: 突然间 我们就要用到枪了

translation.en: And sometimes even a tank.
translation.zh: 有的时候 甚至要用坦克

translation.en: And sometimes even that doesn't work.
translation.zh: 有的时候 连坦克都不灵

translation.en: Especially if you don't stay in the tank, Bob.
translation.zh: 尤其是当你不待在坦克里时对吧 鲍勃

translation.en: Eventually, the really big ones and our military took each other out.
translation.zh: 最终 那些大家伙和我们的军队消灭了彼此

translation.en: We lost 95% of the human population in about a year.
translation.zh: 我们大约在一年时间里损失了95%的人口

translation.en: That's a lot of Bobs.
And a lot of Todds.
Those of us who survived, we hid anywhere we could--
translation.zh: 我们这些幸存下来的人四处找地方藏身

translation.en: bunkers, caves, panic rooms, all around the world.
translation.zh: 地堡、洞穴、安全房 遍布世界各地

translation.en: So for the last seven years I've been living in an underground bunker.
translation.zh: 所以过去七年来 我一直住在地堡里

translation.en: It's not-- It's not as bad as it sounds. Really.
translation.zh: 没听起来那么糟糕 真的

translation.en: It's a great group of people, and we all love each other.
translation.zh: 这里有一群很棒的人 我们彼此相爱

translation.en: It's kinda what I imagined college would have been like.
translation.zh: 我想象中的大学生活就是这样的

translation.en: -[panting] -[woman] Are you sure he's asleep?
[man] Who?
-[woman] Joel. Who else? -[man] Yeah. He's asleep.
translation.zh: -乔尔 除了他还有谁？-是的 他睡着了

translation.en: -[woman] Hang on. Shh. -[man] He's not awake.
-[woman] Are you sure? -It's just you.
[woman] I just-- I don't…
[man] Joel. Joel.
[whispering] See? He's not awake.
-It's just you. -[woman sighs]
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am wide awake.
translation.zh: 亲爱的艾米 我还清醒得很

translation.en: I've just gotten good at not really moving or breathing.
translation.zh: 我只是已经非常擅长不动也不呼吸了

translation.en: Being stuck in a survival bunker
with a bunch of people who have all found their soul mate is less than ideal.
translation.zh: 灵魂伴侣的人困在求生地堡里感觉可不太爽

translation.en: Karen and Ray got together a few months ago,
translation.zh: 凯伦和雷是几个月前在一起的

translation.en: so they're still kinda in their honeymoon phase.
translation.zh: 所以他们还在热恋阶段

translation.en: -[Karen, Ray continue moaning] -It is super physical.
Good for them, you know. They're both very attractive and apparently quite flexible.
translation.zh: 他们倒是爽了 毕竟是俊男靓女嘛 也解锁了很多姿势

translation.en: Hey, life's short. Especially down here.
translation.zh: 嘿 人生苦短 尤其是在这里

translation.en: -Oh. Hey, Ava. -[Ava] Hey, Joel.
-[man] Joel. How's it going? -It's going good, Tim.
translation.zh: -乔尔 你还好吗？-挺好的 蒂姆

translation.en: -How are you-- How are you doing? -[Tim] Yeah, good.
[Joel] Cool.
-I couldn't sleep. -[Ava] Yeah, we know the feeling.
translation.zh: -我睡不着-我们知道这种感觉

translation.en: Yeah. Probably not for the same reasons.
You guys's, uh, door's open. Is that-- Did you know that?
translation.zh: 你们的门没关 是…你们知道吗？

translation.en: -[Ava] Yeah. -[Tim] Yeah, we know.
Okay.
[Joel] After Tim's parents were eaten by termites,
translation.zh: 蒂姆的父母被白蚁吃掉后

translation.en: he and Ava became inseparable.
translation.zh: 他和艾娃就一刻都分不开了

translation.en: Okay. Good night.
-In every way. -[both] Night.
That's the asteroid they named 616 Agatha.
translation.zh: 这是他们命名为阿加莎616的小行星

translation.en: And these are all the chemical bombs they sent up to try and…
translation.zh: 这些都是他们发射的化学炸弹 试图…

translation.en: [Joel] So, pretty much everyone's coupled up down here.
translation.zh: 这里的人几乎都是情侣

translation.en: Our first baby was born last winter. It was super emotional.
translation.zh: 这里第一个宝宝去年冬天出生了 大家都很激动

translation.en: Welcome to the apocalypse, kid.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到末日 孩子

translation.en: The food sucks. At least you'll never know what you're missing.
translation.zh: 这里的食物很难吃至少你从来都没尝过美食

translation.en: Kala and Connor got together after Carol died.
translation.zh: 卡拉和康纳是在卡罗尔死后在一起的

translation.en: Carol was a cow who ate a box of laundry detergent.
translation.zh: 卡罗尔是只牛 它吃了一盒洗衣粉

translation.en: -And now we only have one cow. -[cow mooing]
translation.zh: 所以我们现在只有一头牛了

translation.en: Her name's Gertie.
Gertie is great.
Gertie's not our only food source.
translation.zh: 格蒂不是我们唯一的食物来源

translation.en: We have a hunting party that brings back whatever they can from the surface.
translation.zh: 我们有一支狩猎队他们会尽可能从地表带回东西来

translation.en: It was easier in the beginning, you know, before we ran out of bullets.
translation.zh: 一开始的时候很容易我们还没有用完子弹

translation.en: Facing down one of those things with a janky handmade weapon
translation.zh: 用破破烂烂的自制武器放倒任何一个庞然大物

translation.en: is no walk in the park.
Or so they tell me. I-I don't go on the hunting parties.
translation.zh: 所以他们跟我说 我不用去参加狩猎

translation.en: They need me in the kitchen. I'm kinda the… -[chopping] -…the chef of the bunker.
translation.zh: 他们让我待在厨房我就像是地堡里的主厨

translation.en: Everyone likes my minestrone.
translation.zh: 大家都喜欢我的意大利杂菜汤

translation.en: Being the only single person in the bunker has its perks too.
translation.zh: 作为地堡里的唯一单身人士也有好处

translation.en: I get to hang out with Mavis.
Of course, she's not much for conversation anymore.
translation.zh: 当然 它已经是个哑巴了

translation.en: Her core battery's shot, just like every other Mavis, I'd imagine.
translation.zh: 它的核心电池废掉了我想就像其他梅薇丝一样

translation.en: Actually never seen a working one.
[Joel] Sure wish you were here, Aimee.
translation.zh: 真希望你在这里 艾米

translation.en: I'd love for you to meet everyone.
[Joel] Oh, yeah.
Maybe we could do a little target practice together.
translation.zh: 或许我们可以一起练练射击

translation.en: It's kinda my thing.
Well…
-Sorry, Mavis. -[Gertie moos]
[Connor] Hustle, hustle, people. We gotta move.
translation.zh: 大家快点 我们要赶快行动了

translation.en: [grunting] Guys!
Guys! I got the weapons.
translation.zh: 伙计们！我把武器拿过来了

translation.en: -Stay. -What?
-Get what you need, and let's go. -What's happening? What's going on?
translation.zh: -拿上自己需要的 我们走-怎么了？什么情况？

translation.en: -[Connor] We're breached. -Breached?
-Joel. -What do you mean?
-Like inside-the-bunker breached? -That's what "breached" means, kiddo.
translation.zh: -进到地堡里了吗？-“攻破”就是这个意思 小子

translation.en: [whispers] Breached.
Anna Lucia and I will engage. Anderson and Tim, flank us.
translation.zh: 安娜卢西亚和我进攻安德森和蒂姆从侧面掩护我们

translation.en: Flank 'em, yeah, okay. Where do you guys need me? The rear, or--
translation.zh: 侧面掩护他们 没问题你们需要我在哪里？在后方 还是…

translation.en: -I thought we were past this, Joel. -Past what? You need help. I can help.
translation.zh: -我们已经谈过这事儿了 乔尔-谈过什么？我能帮忙

translation.en: -Let me help. -You gonna make me say it?
-Say what? -You can't handle it, Joel.
translation.zh: -说什么？-你应付不来的 乔尔

translation.en: -You're shook. -Okay, yeah.
translation.zh: -你总是怕得不行-好吧 没错

translation.en: -So, you guys don't get scared ever? -[Connor] We get scared.
translation.zh: -那你们就没害怕过吗？-我们害怕

translation.en: [Tim] We all get scared, Joel, but you get really scared.
translation.zh: 我们都害怕 但只有你会被吓破胆

translation.en: -We're not trying to make you feel bad. -We love you, Joel.
translation.zh: -我们不想让你感觉难过-我们爱你 乔尔

translation.en: [Connor] But you're unsafe.
-[Tim] You're a liability. -Even on supply runs.
translation.zh: -你是个累赘-哪怕在运送补给时

translation.en: Okay, why did that speech feel so rehearsed?
translation.zh: 这段话怎么像排练过的？

translation.en: -Connor. -[device beeps]
Okay, 30 meters out. Let's move.
-Be careful, Connor-Bear. -I will, Kala-Bee.
translation.zh: -小心点 康纳熊熊-我会的 卡拉蜂蜂

translation.en: [Connor] Load out.
Go with them.
[Karen] They're getting close.
-[gasps] -[Ava] Shit.
[Karen whispers] Oh, my God.
-[Anderson] It got one of 'em. -[Karen] What about the others?
They're coming back.
They need help. I'm going.
translation.zh: -乔尔！-他们需要支援 我要去

translation.en: [Kala] Joel! Wait!
-[whispering] Connor? -[faint groan]
Connor.
Did I shoot it, or did you?
translation.zh: 是我射中的 还是你射中的？

translation.en: What do you think?
You.
[Joel] Oh, and I have a pretty severe freezing problem.
translation.zh: 我身子僵住的问题相当严重

translation.en: But I am working on it.
-[woman whispers] How is it looking? -I think it looks really good.
-Does it look like me? -Yeah.
Are you sure that this pose looks natural?
translation.zh: 你确定这个姿势看起来很自然吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
I think it's really good.
What are you doing? Don't move.
-Will you let me see it? -Don't-- Don't move. Aimee.
translation.zh: -我可以看看吗？-别动 艾米

translation.en: -I really wanna see it. -[growls]
[laughs] Can I see it?
Okay.
Okay.
-Ready? -Mm-hmm.
[Joel] What do you think?
Why do I have a beard? [snickers]
No, that's shading. I did the shading.
translation.zh: 不是的 那是阴影 我画阴影了

translation.en: My head is-- is so large.
-You have a big head. -And my hand is so tiny.
translation.zh: -你的头本来就很大-我的手这么小

translation.en: You have tiny hands.
I love it. I frickin' love it.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢 我太喜欢了

translation.en: -That's super sweet, 'cause it's terrible. -[Aimee laughs]
translation.zh: 你人真好 因为我画得超级烂

translation.en: -I got you something too. -What?
translation.zh: -我也给你准备了点东西-什么？

translation.en: I don't know if these are the right ones.
No way. These are the ones that I-I-I wanted to get.
translation.zh: 不会吧 我早就想要了

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-What's happening right now? -Uh--
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm dancing with my shoulders.
-Oh, yeah. -Oh, yeah.
This has been the best summer of my life.
translation.zh: 我从未有过这么美好的夏天

translation.en: Mine too.
What are you doing?
-Do you know what time it is? -Uh, I think it's, like, 6:30.
translation.zh: -你知道现在几点了吗？-得有6点半了吧

translation.en: Aimee, you're-- you're scaring Crocodile Carl.
translation.zh: 艾米 你把鳄鱼卡尔吓到了

translation.en: Okay, look away, Crocodile Carl.
translation.zh: 好吧 别看 鳄鱼卡尔

translation.en: Oh. Look away. Hey, I get it.
translation.zh: 什么别看 嘿 我懂了

translation.en: -[Aimee giggles] -I get it.
We need to go.
I'm scared.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, This week has been especially shitty.
translation.zh: 亲爱的艾米 这周过得极其糟糕

translation.en: We lost Connor to what looked like a really big ant.
translation.zh: 康纳死在一只看起来很像大蚂蚁的生物口下

translation.en: Helps me to draw them.
translation.zh: 画出来比较能帮我回忆

translation.en: I try to capture their essence,
translation.zh: 我在尝试找到这些怪物的原型

translation.en: scribble down some notes on how to kill them.
translation.zh: 记录下杀死它们的方法

translation.en: Sometimes I think it's the only way I know how to cope with these things.
translation.zh: 有时我觉得这是我唯一知道的应对方法

translation.en: -[switch clicks] -This is 7045. Come in, 3022.
-I repeat, come in, 3022. Over. -[switch clicks]
translation.zh: 重复一遍 收到请回复 3022 完毕

translation.en: [woman] This is 3022. What is it now, Ray?
translation.zh: 我是3022 又怎么了 雷？

translation.en: Hey, Janice. No, it's actually-- It's, uh, Joel.
translation.zh: 嘿 珍妮丝 其实我是…乔尔

translation.en: -[chuckles] Oh. Joel. -Yeah.
All right. Hold on one second.
Aimee, it's Ray!
It's Joel. Thanks, Janice.
translation.zh: 是乔尔 谢谢你啊 珍妮丝

translation.en: -[Aimee] Joel! Hey! -Hey, Aimee! Hi!
-How are you? -Hi. Yeah, I, uh-- I'm good.
-It's so good to hear your voice. -I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: -听到你的声音真好-我真感到难过

translation.en: I heard on the open frequency that one of you guys got killed.
translation.zh: 我在全域广播上听到你们那边有个人牺牲了

translation.en: Yeah. Breached the bunker.
Wow. Actually got inside?
translation.zh: 哇 真的进到里面了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. It's the first time it's happened. It was kinda scary.
translation.zh: 是啊 这是第一次遇到 太可怕了

translation.en: Did you have to fight it too?
Yeah. Yeah, a little. I had to fight it a little bit.
translation.zh: 对啊 稍微打了一下我就稍微战斗了一下

translation.en: Actually got super ripped since the last time you saw me, so--
translation.zh: 自从上次你见我之后我就成了肌肉男了…

translation.en: Oh. Wow! [giggles] Super ripped, huh?
Yeah, I was kidding. I'm not super ripped. That was just a bad joke.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的 我才没变成肌肉男这个笑话真冷

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you're okay.
Thanks. Yeah.
I am still kinda blown away that you were even able to find my colony on this thing.
translation.zh: 我很惊讶 你竟然能在这上面找到我的避难所

translation.en: I know. It's pretty crazy.
translation.zh: 我知道 非常不可思议

translation.en: 'Cause I found it on the first one. What are the odds?
translation.zh: 我第一次试就找到了 多巧啊？

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -[Aimee] Crazy.
Yeah. No, I-I called-- I called, like, 90.
translation.zh: 开玩笑的 我试了90个电台

translation.en: Hey, you know what I, uh-- know what I wish sometimes?
translation.zh: 嘿 你知道我有时候会期待什么吗？

translation.en: What?
That I could, like, s-snap my fingers and be back in that car with you.
translation.zh: 我能打个响指回到那辆车里 和你待在一起

translation.en: Man, that'd be nice.
Yeah. Too bad it's, uh…
you know, impossible.
Kinda feels like everything is impossible these days.
translation.zh: 最近感觉一切都成为了不可能

translation.en: Taking care of this whole colony is exhausting.
translation.zh: 管理整个避难所真是够累人的

translation.en: I, uh-- I-I write you letters.
Really?
Yeah. Yeah, I-I write you letters sometimes.
translation.zh: 对啊 我有的时候会给你写信

translation.en: -Aw! -All the time.
I'd love to read 'em.
-Really? I would love to read them to-- -[static surges, stops]
-No. Aimee? -[switches clicking]
-Aimee? -[static buzzing]
[Joel] We've lost a lot of people over the years.
translation.zh: 这些年来 很多人离开了我们

translation.en: You'd think you'd get numb to it after a certain point.
translation.zh: 你以为自己经历多了就会变得麻木

translation.en: You don't.
-I'm sorry. -Thank God! Where have you been, Joel?
translation.zh: -抱歉-谢天谢地！乔尔 你去哪了？

translation.en: We have to go right now. Say your goodbyes, get in the car.
translation.zh: 我们要马上走了 道个别吧 快上车

translation.en: -I should go. -Maybe you should come with us.
translation.zh: -我要走了-也许你应该跟我们一起

translation.en: -No, my mom is waiting. I'm sorry. -[creature roaring]
translation.zh: 不行 我妈妈在等我 抱歉

translation.en: Get in the car! Aimee, you need to hurry home now!
translation.zh: 快上车！艾米 你要快点回家了

translation.en: -I want you to have this. -What? This is Crocodile Carl.
It's your good luck charm.
-Be careful. -You too.
Aimee.
I love you.
I love you too.
I'm gonna come find you.
You better.
[Aimee's voice] You better.
[Anna Lucia] I wanna know how it got in.
translation.zh: 我想知道它是怎么进来的

translation.en: [Ray] It appears to have ripped through one of our perimeter defenses.
translation.zh: 它貌似突破了我们的一个外围防线

translation.en: [Ava] It ripped through steel?
[Tim] Anderson and I resealed the breach point and vent.
translation.zh: 安德森和我重新密封了突破口还有通风口

translation.en: -Nothing's getting in that way again. -But why did it happen?
translation.zh: -不会再出这样的事了-但为什么会这样呢？

translation.en: It was a freak occurrence. There's no reason to think it'll happen again.
translation.zh: 只是个意外而已 没理由发生第二次

translation.en: -[Ray] We should try to stay calm. -[all arguing]
-How far away is Aimee's colony? -[arguing stops]
translation.zh: 这里离艾米的避难所有多远？

translation.en: -What? -Aimee's colony.
-How far away is it? -About 85 miles.
-How long does that take to get there? -You're not actually thinking of going?
translation.zh: -多长时间能到那里？-你不是真的要去吧？

translation.en: Tim, just… humor me.
translation.zh: 蒂姆 就跟我说说嘛

translation.en: -How long? -Seven days.
Minimum.
An armed and trained hunting party would be lucky to last 50 miles on the surface.
translation.zh: 一支全副武装、训练有素的狩猎队能在地表活动80公里已属幸运

translation.en: But you, Joel…
All right, now I need volunteers
translation.zh: 好吧 现在我需要志愿者

translation.en: to help reinforce some of the outer perimeter.
translation.zh: 帮忙加固一些外围区域

translation.en: -[Anna Lucia] Yeah, I'm gonna go. -[all chattering]
-Ava's got this. -[Karen] Exactly.
I'm gonna go.
It's an impossible journey, Joel.
translation.zh: 乔尔 这趟旅程你没可能完成

translation.en: No, I'm serious.
I love you guys, but there's one person in this world
translation.zh: 我爱你们 但世界上有一个曾经让我感到幸福的人

translation.en: who ever truly made me happy,
translation.zh: 但世界上有一个曾经让我感到幸福的人

translation.en: and she's only 85 miles away.
And I'm gonna go see her.
That felt awesome.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am done hiding.
translation.zh: 亲爱的艾米 我受够了东躲西藏

translation.en: I'm done waiting for things to get better.
translation.zh: 我受够了坐等事情好转

translation.en: It's time to take matters into my own hands.
Time to let someone else make the minestrone.
translation.zh: 是时候让别人做意大利杂菜汤了

translation.en: I'm taking a radio, even though it doesn't have power.
translation.zh: 我要带一台收音机走 虽然它没电

translation.en: But I'm gonna take it anyway.
-Wish me luck, Gertie. -[Gertie moos]
Mavis, take care of her.
You're not joking, are you?
Nope. Nope, I'm not.
He's not joking.
We're not letting you leave, Joel. You're needed here.
translation.zh: 我们不让你走 乔尔 这里需要你

translation.en: Tim, no, I'm not. Come on. I don't do anything.
translation.zh: 蒂姆 这里不需要我 得了吧我什么都做不了

translation.en: Joel, that's not true. You fix the radio. You make the minestrone.
translation.zh: 乔尔 不是的 你会修电台你会做意大利杂菜汤

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. Doesn't sound as important when I say it out loud.
translation.zh: 我知道从我嘴里讲出来感觉你并没有那么重要

translation.en: I appreciate you trying. Really, I do.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的好意 真的

translation.en: I just don't feel like I belong anywhere.
translation.zh: 但我感觉我不属于任何地方

translation.en: I don't really wanna die all alone at the end of the world, so…
translation.zh: 我不想在世界末日孤独死去 所以…

translation.en: Look, I know you guys all just think of me as, like, some little, pathetic,
translation.zh: 听着 我知道你们都觉得我是一个卑微

translation.en: adorable hedgehog.
But I can take care of myself.
I'm actually probably a lot stronger than you might think.
translation.zh: 我可能比你们想象的坚强得多

translation.en: -We made you a map. -Thanks, Karen.
translation.zh: -我们给你画了一张地图-谢谢 凯伦

translation.en: Just… take care.
Everything will try to kill you.
translation.zh: 所有东西都会想置你于死地

translation.en: Be observant. Use the advantages that you have.
translation.zh: 你要注意观察 利用自身优势

translation.en: -You're fast and small, so… -Right.
translation.zh: -你个头小 行动敏捷 所以…-是的

translation.en: -Don't fight. -Don't fight.
Just run and hide.
Thanks, Ray.
You're an asshole if you get eaten.
translation.zh: 你要是被吃掉 我就当少了个混球

translation.en: -Okay. -Nice.
I love you guys. Tell Aimee I'll see her in seven days.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 告诉艾米 我七天后见她

translation.en: -[Anderson] We believe in you. -[Tim] Love you, buddy.
Where am I?
Well, it's not super useful.
Okay, well, you know what? We know we gotta head west. Right?
translation.zh: 好吧 我得一路向西 对吧？

translation.en: So, let's just… do that.
Start with something easy. West.
translation.zh: 先从简单的开始 西边

translation.en: Nope, it's this way. West is this way.
translation.zh: 错了 是这边 这边才是西

translation.en: Shit.
Split the difference. Go this way.
Done. First decision made.
translation.zh: 完成 做了第一个决定

translation.en: [Joel] Dear Aimee, I am doing it.
translation.zh: 亲爱的艾米 我出来找你了

translation.en: I'm really doing it!
Honestly, I thought it'd be way worse. So far, it's not too bad.
translation.zh: 说实话 我以为情况会糟得多但到目前为止还好

translation.en: I've seen a lot of signs of death, but no actual death.
translation.zh: 我见了很多死亡的迹象但没见到真正的死亡

translation.en: So, cross your fingers.
Monster eggs.
Trying to stay positive.
Weather's nice. Getting some fresh air. What else can I tell ya?
translation.zh: 天气很好 呼吸一下新鲜空气 我还有什么可以告诉你呢？

translation.en: Cool.
-Wham-O-- -[creatures chirping]
-[wings fluttering] -No.
-[branches snapping] -Run and hide.
Hide in the house. Hide in the house.
No.
No, no, no. No!
-[barking continues] -[grunts] No! No, no, no! [screaming]
-[growling] -Yes! Bite it! Bite it off!
Wait. Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
Where are you going?
Whoa, that was so cool.
Nice place.
-Can I sit? -[whines]
Thanks.
You all alone?
-[whines] -Yeah. Me too.
-Boy? -[grunts]
Is that your name? Boy? Your name is Boy.
translation.zh: 你叫这个吗？博伊？你叫博伊？

translation.en: I'm Joel.
Nice to meet ya.
Thanks, uh… Thanks for saving my life, Boy.
translation.zh: 谢谢你救了我的命 博伊

translation.en: -[growls, whines] -Is this a dress?
Oh. Oh. Oh. Oh. Sorry.
Okay, I won't touch it again.
translation.zh: 好的 我不会再碰了

translation.en: Was that your owner's?
It's okay. You don't have to talk about it.
translation.zh: 没关系 你不说也没事

translation.en: Sorry.
Wait. Did you think I was her?
translation.zh: 等等 你以为我是她吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna lie down too. Is that o--
No, it's okay. Just my backpack.
translation.zh: 别担心 只是我的背包而已

translation.en: You know, I had a girl, too, once.
translation.zh: 其实我以前也和一个女生在一起

translation.en: Think you would've really liked her. You guys would totally get along.
translation.zh: 我想你会喜欢她的 你们会很合得来

translation.en: She loves dogs. I mean, all animals. She's a big animal lover.
translation.zh: 她很喜欢狗狗 所有动物她都喜欢她超级喜欢小动物

translation.en: I haven't seen her in seven years.
Long time. That's why I'm trying to go find her.
translation.zh: 很久了 所以我想去找她

translation.en: I haven't told anyone this, but I'm kinda nervous about it.
translation.zh: 我还没跟别人说过这句话但我很害怕

translation.en: Good night, Boy.
Weakness: dogs.
That's you.
You wouldn't happen to have a power source to a ham radio in here, would you?
translation.zh: 你不会正好有业余无线电台的电源吧？

translation.en: 'Cause I have a…
Never mind.
Huh. Lipstick.
Aimee.
Hey, would you mind if I kept this?
Thanks.
All right, well… this is it.
Thanks for having me.
I should… stop talking to a dog.
translation.zh: 我不能继续和一只狗说话了

translation.en: Okay. I'll see ya.
[sighs] Okay.
Oh, hey, hey, hey. No, no, no. None of that. Something might hear you.
translation.zh: 不行 别这样 小心有怪物听到

translation.en: You wanna come with me?
Okay. You can come.
Let's go. Come on.
Uh-- What--
Yeah, we can bring that. You want me to put it in my bag?
translation.zh: 好的 可以带上这个我放进包里行吗？

translation.en: Okay. It's okay. I'm gonna keep it safe. I promise.
translation.zh: 好吧 没关系的我发誓会保护好它的

translation.en: Going in the safe backpack.
See?
Okay, you ready?
translation.zh: 好了 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Let's go. Come on.
Okay, that's really gonna have to stop.
translation.zh: 好了 你真的不能再叫了

translation.en: Feels good, actually, having company.
translation.zh: 有你陪着感觉还挺好的

translation.en: [Joel] Dear Aimee, guess what.
translation.zh: 亲爱的艾米 你猜怎么着？

translation.en: I got a dog, and he's the coolest. His name is Boy.
translation.zh: 我捡到了一只狗它最酷了 它的名字叫博伊

translation.en: He saved my life from a giant frog in a pool who tried to eat me with his tongue.
translation.zh: 它从一只想要吃我的池塘巨蛙嘴里救了我的命

translation.en: And then we hung out on his bus. Man, do we make a great team.
translation.zh: 然后我们去它的大巴车上玩了天啊 我们可真是天作之合

translation.en: We found out we have a ton in common too. I feel like we can talk about anything.
translation.zh: 我们也发现我们有很多共同点我感觉我们可以无话不谈

translation.en: You gotta see us out here. We're like this iconic duo.
translation.zh: 你真该看看我们我们简直是经典组合

translation.en: I don't know. Feels like when we're together, we're unstoppable.
translation.zh: 我也说不清感觉一合体就势不可挡

translation.en: Hey. What are you doing? What you got in there?
translation.zh: 嘿 你干什么呢？ 里面有什么？

translation.en: -[clattering] -[Boy yips]
-Oh, my gosh. Yeah. Go. Go! -[creature chittering]
translation.zh: 我的天啊 好吧 快跑…

translation.en: We gotta go! Come on!
Berries. [gasps]
Sustenance. Perfect.
-[growls] -Ow! What-- What are you doing?
But they look so good.
Yeah, you know what? I don't think I should eat these.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我不该吃

translation.en: It's crazy the things you forget about the world. Like the smells.
translation.zh: 忘记地球上的东西真是太可怕了比如说气味

translation.en: The grass, the trees, the flowers.
Sure, you get the occasional bloody corpse, but… Aaah!
translation.zh: 没错 时不时也会看到血淋淋的尸体 但是…

translation.en: [whispers] Oh, no. I fell in a hole.
translation.zh: 天啊 我掉进坑里了

translation.en: -[whines] -Okay, I just gotta…
climb out.
I can climb out.
[whispers] Oh, no.
This is bad.
-Oh, this is so bad. -[barking]
[whispering] Stop. Stop it. Shh. Stop it.
It's a rope, you numbskull!
translation.zh: 这是条绳子 你个蠢蛋！

translation.en: Put it around your foot and grab on!
translation.zh: 套到你的脚上 抓紧！

translation.en: Okay, come on! Hold on! [grunts]
Pull up! [screams]
-You wanna look at 'em? Oh, shit! -[groaning]
Minnow, finish 'em off.
One, two, three, four and--
Are we-- [groans, spits]
-[exhales] -Always count to five.
Was that a samurai sword?
Why'd you fall into a Sandgobbler's nest?
translation.zh: 你为什么掉进了沙丘虫的洞穴里？

translation.en: I didn't mean to, you know. I was just-- I was walking.
translation.zh: 我不小心掉进去的我只是…我当时只顾着走

translation.en: -What's your name? -Joel.
Joel Dawson.
I'm, uh, Clyde. This is Minnow.
translation.zh: 我是克莱德 这是米诺

translation.en: You're lucky we weren't monsters. You were yelling like a girl.
translation.zh: 你要庆幸我们不是怪物你像个小女孩一样大喊大叫

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] "This is bad! This is so bad!"
Okay, I don't sound like that. My voice is not that high-pitched.
translation.zh: 好吧 我没那样叫 我声音没那么尖

translation.en: -Yeah, it is. -Yes, it is.
It was higher than mine, and I'm eight.
translation.zh: 比我的声音还尖 我才八岁

translation.en: What in God's name are you doing up here alone anyway?
translation.zh: 你究竟一个人在地表上做什么？

translation.en: -I'm not alone. I've got Boy too. -[whines]
translation.zh: 不光是我一个人 还有博伊呢

translation.en: Oh, wait, no! No, wait, wait!
translation.zh: 等等 不要！不要 别冲动！

translation.en: -[Joel groans] -Oh, my God, it's a puppy!
[Minnow] Come here, Boy! Come here, Boy!
-They almost killed my dog. -Hi, Boy!
translation.zh: -他们差点杀死我的狗-嗨 博伊！

translation.en: -Hi! [giggles] -[Clyde chuckles]
Hey.
So, uh, what happened with your colony, man?
translation.zh: 伙计 你的避难所怎么了？

translation.en: They kick you out?
No, I actually left on my own.
translation.zh: 不 其实我是自己离开的

translation.en: -Something I had to do. -You stole food, didn't you?
translation.zh: -我要做一件事-你是不是偷食物了？

translation.en: -He's a food stealer. -Yeah.
No, I didn't steal any food.
translation.zh: 不是的 我没有偷食物

translation.en: Right.
Me and my colony were really close. Like family. Okay?
translation.zh: 我和我的避难所室友都很亲密就像家人一样 好吗？

translation.en: They were super upset that I left.
translation.zh: 我走了他们超级难过的

translation.en: -Time to go, Minnow. -[Joel] Time to go? Why? -So, what-- -[growling continues]
translation.zh: -该出发了 米诺-该出发了？为什么？那我怎么…

translation.en: What, uh-- What was that? What's going on?
translation.zh: 那是什么声音？这是怎么回事？

translation.en: -Could've been a lot of things. -[Minnow] Tree Flamer. Herd Stomper.
translation.zh: -可能会是很多东西-燃树怪、踩牛兽

translation.en: [scoffs] Rockdiver.
Limbsnapper. Limbcrusher. And my favorite-- the Chumbler.
translation.zh: 断肢兽、碎肢兽还有我的最爱：粉碎暴兽

translation.en: [Joel] Okay, I get it. A lot of-- A lot of names.
translation.zh: 好吧 我明白了 各种各样的名字

translation.en: [Clyde] Whatever it is, it took your screams for the dinner bell.
translation.zh: 不管是什么 你的尖叫对它来说就是开饭铃

translation.en: If it's got your scent, it's gonna be on you for a while.
translation.zh: 如果它闻到你的气味就会跟你一会儿

translation.en: Hey, maybe I could, like, I don't know, come with you guys.
translation.zh: 嘿 也许我可以跟你们一起走

translation.en: [Clyde] Which way you headed?
Going west.
To the coast. Jenner Beach.
Yeah. We're not cutting north just yet.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们还不需要朝北走

translation.en: -Not cu-- Not cutting north just yet. -Come on. Come on.
Yeah. Whatever you want.
You guys want me to come, I'll come.
translation.zh: 你们愿意带我走 我就跟着

translation.en: Come on.
That's a good, uh… little workout.
[Clyde] A girl, huh?
translation.zh: 为了一个女孩 是吗？

translation.en: Yeah. [groans]
You left a nice, safe colony to travel all the way to the ocean
translation.zh: 你离开了一个安全的避难所踏上了去海边的旅程

translation.en: for a girl you ain't seen since you were, what, 17?
translation.zh: 为了一个女孩你从多大就没见过她了 17岁？

translation.en: No, I know what you're thinking. I know how it sounds. It's crazy.
translation.zh: 我知道你在想什么我知道这听起来很疯狂

translation.en: But… I don't know.
If you knew our connection, you'd probably feel differently.
translation.zh: 如果你了解我们的感情你可能就不这么想了

translation.en: We actually just got back in touch over the radio a few weeks ago.
translation.zh: 我们几周前才通过无线电重新联系上

translation.en: And it's still there. It's just magical. And so sweet.
translation.zh: 还是一样的感觉太神奇了 感觉很甜蜜

translation.en: She loves me too, so a "pick up right here we left off" kind of thing.
translation.zh: 她也爱我 那种“再续前缘”的感觉

translation.en: -It's still there. -You ever hear the term "fool's errand"?
translation.zh: 她也爱我 那种“再续前缘”的感觉 -感情还是没有变-你有没有听过一个词叫“傻瓜行为”

translation.en: All right, what, so I'm a fool because I believe in true love?
translation.zh: 好吧 怎么了？因为我相信真爱所以就是傻瓜吗？

translation.en: No, you're a fool because you're out here alone,
translation.zh: 不 因为你单独行动 所以你是个傻瓜

translation.en: you don't know a thing about survival…
[Joel] Wind.
…you shoot for shit,
yet you got an attitude like you're some kind of noble warrior
translation.zh: 但你现在就像一个乘着爱情之翼飞翔的

translation.en: floating on the wings of love.
-Doesn't work like that. -Okay.
Super encouraging speech.
translation.zh: 这段话还真是鼓舞人心啊

translation.en: -Damn it. -You're braining out.
-Huh? -Braining out. Thinking too much.
translation.zh: 脑力衰竭 想得太多了

translation.en: I always clear my mind and say to myself,
translation.zh: 我一直都会让大脑冷静下来对我自己说

translation.en: "a needle through water."
"A needle through water"?
Trust me. My dad was the best archer in my colony.
translation.zh: 相信我 我爸爸曾是我们避难所里最好的射手

translation.en: Oh, really? Okay. Then how come he's not the one giving me the lessons?
translation.zh: 真的吗？好吧那为什么不是他来教我？

translation.en: 'Cause I'm not her dad.
Yeah, my dad got killed.
translation.zh: 没错 我爸爸被杀了

translation.en: Back when we lived in the subway station.
translation.zh: 我们住在地铁站的时候

translation.en: Along with Elliot.
Uh, wh-who's Elliot?
My son.
-Oh, I'm sorry. -No need to be sorry.
We all have stories like that. Don't we?
translation.zh: 我们都经历过亲人离世 对吗？

translation.en: Needle through water.
[mutters] Needle through water.
Hey, that was pretty close.
-It was better. -It was really good, right?
Right?
[Clyde] Tell you what, kid. You gonna hang with us, you need to know stuff.
translation.zh: 跟你说吧 小子 要和我们待在一起有些事情你得知道

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
-First lesson. -Yeah. Hit me.
translation.zh: -第一个法则-好啊 请赐教

translation.en: Always survey from high ground when possible.
translation.zh: 条件允许的话 要一直从高处侦查

translation.en: -Always. -[Joel] Always.
Helps you spot the big ones in advance.
translation.zh: 这会帮你提前发现那些大块头

translation.en: Nice to know that thing's not following us anymore.
translation.zh: 很高兴那个家伙不跟着我们了

translation.en: No, no, it's definitely still following us. Just saw it.
translation.zh: 不 它肯定还跟着我们呢 我刚看见

translation.en: -What-- -Yeah.
-Chumbler. -I knew it.
-Big son of a bitch too. -Big sumanabitch.
translation.zh: -也是个大混蛋-超大的大魂淡

translation.en: -[groans] -[Clyde] Got your scent too, man.
-It's gonna be hard to shake. -Then why are we still standing here?
translation.zh: -很难甩掉-那我们还站在这干什么？

translation.en: Relax. Chumblers aren't fast.
translation.zh: 别紧张 粉碎暴兽移动很缓慢

translation.en: -We gotta keep moving. -Mmm.
Should've already been gone.
-It's got my scent. -[Clyde] Oh, yeah, it does.
-[Clyde] Comin'? -Yeah!
-Where you guys headed anyway? -[Clyde] North.
-To the mountains. -What's up there?
translation.zh: 去山区 那里有什么？

translation.en: A, uh, place called Snow Mountain Wilderness.
translation.zh: 一个叫做雪山荒野的地方

translation.en: Supposed to be some kind of colony up there full of survivors.
translation.zh: 那里的避难所好像有很多幸存者

translation.en: The cold and elevation help to keep the monsters away.
translation.zh: 寒冷和海拔有助于阻止怪物入侵

translation.en: You should definitely come with us.
translation.zh: 你一定要和我们一起去

translation.en: Well, I would, but, you know--
translation.zh: 我也想 但是你知道…

translation.en: You gotta go find your girlfriend.
-Yeah, yeah. -[Joel] Uh…
Minnow.
If you knew her, you'd really like her. She's a super cool person.
translation.zh: 如果你了解她 你会喜欢上她的她是个超级酷的人

translation.en: Well, she's not gonna like you,
'cause you can't even get out of a Sandgobbler's nest.
translation.zh: 因为你连沙丘虫的洞穴都出不来

translation.en: And honestly, I just like you 'cause you have a really cute dog.
translation.zh: 讲真的 我之所以喜欢你是因为你有只很可爱的狗狗

translation.en: -Hurts my feelings. -You're so useless.
It just means she likes you, man.
She's, uh-- She's been through a lot.
Yeah.
So annoying.
-Joel. -What?
Don't move.
-Oh, my God. Why? -Give me your shirt.
translation.zh: -天啊 怎么了？-把你的短袖给我

translation.en: -[rumbling] -My shirt? What do you mean?
translation.zh: -我的短袖？-没错 什么意思？

translation.en: [Clyde] Your shirt, man. Give me your shirt.
translation.zh: 你的短袖 伙计 把你的短袖给我

translation.en: -Okay. -Get-- Hurr-- Come on.
-Do what he says, Joel. -Give me your shirt.
translation.zh: -听他的 乔尔-把你的短袖给我

translation.en: -[rumbling continues] -Shut up. I'm trying.
Easy. Take it easy.
-That's it. That's it. -Is it a Chumbler?
-No. -[whimpers] What is it called?
Take it easy. Lean over, man.
translation.zh: 别慌 弯下身子 伙计

translation.en: -If I don't make it-- -Shh, shh.
-That's it. That's it. -[gasping, whimpering]
Just stay very still.
-[trembling whisper] Okay. -Shh.
[Clyde] Okay, buddy.
Shh, shh, shh, shh. Easy does it.
-[growling continues] -It's okay.
You're okay.
It's okay. You're all right.
All right. Okay, now.
-On your way. -[roars]
Okay, now.
-All good. On your way now. -[roaring continues]
On your way.
Good boy. Good boy.
What you so scared for? Boulder Snails are nice.
translation.zh: 你为什么这么害怕？巨石蜗牛很温顺

translation.en: There can be nice ones?
You can always tell in their eyes. Just look at their eyes.
translation.zh: 你总能从它们的眼神看出来看它们的眼睛就好

translation.en: -This one probably saved our lives too. -[whispers] Saved our--
translation.zh: -这只蜗牛可能也会救我们的命-救我们的…

translation.en: Gonna spread your scent all over this hillside.
translation.zh: 它会把你的气味布满整个山坡

translation.en: Shoot. That old Chumbler ain't gonna know which way to go.
translation.zh: 这下厉害了那个粉碎暴兽会迷失方向的

translation.en: [Joel] So the Chumbler's gonna follow my shirt?
translation.zh: 所以粉碎暴兽会跟着我的短袖吗？

translation.en: -[Boulder Snail roars] -Thank you, Mr. Boulder Snail.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 巨石蜗牛先生

translation.en: -Thank you, Mr. Boulder Snail! -[slurred] Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 巨石蜗牛先生！-谢谢

translation.en: [Clyde] Yeah, they're very sensitive, you know.
But they'll crush your ass…
in a second.
[Clyde] What you working on, man?
Just a little project I started a while back in my colony.
translation.zh: 在避难所时刚开始整理的小项目

translation.en: Every time we encountered a new monster, I'd just make a little entry.
translation.zh: 每次我们遇到一个新怪物我就会创建一个小条目

translation.en: A drawing. Um, just some info about it.
translation.zh: 画幅画 记录一下它们的信息

translation.en: You know, strengths, weaknesses. Stuff like that.
translation.zh: 类似它们的强项和弱点这样的东西

translation.en: Made me feel like I was helping out, you know.
translation.zh: 会让我感觉自己还有点用

translation.en: -[Clyde] You're a pretty good artist. -[Joel] Thanks.
-I seen this one. Ugly bastard. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我见过这种 丑八怪一个-是啊

translation.en: -Doesn't like loud noises. -Oh, yeah.
Also doesn't like shotgun blasts to the head.
translation.zh: 还有一个弱点是猎枪爆头

translation.en: Might wanna add that.
Shotgun to the face.
-Yeah. Got it. -[Clyde] Oh.
-Do you mind if I… -Oh, sure.
Yeah. Oh, thanks. Thanks.
-Oh, wow. -[Joel] Yeah.
I was 16 when it hit.
translation.zh: 遭到撞击的时候我才16岁

translation.en: Yeah, they sent everything up at once to take her down.
translation.zh: 他们一口气万弹齐发摧毁掉它

translation.en: They had the balls to call us the lucky ones
translation.zh: 他们还有脸叫我们幸运儿

translation.en: just 'cause whatever the hell was in those things didn't affect us.
translation.zh: 只是因为里面的东西对我们没影响

translation.en: Ain't nothing lucky about getting kicked off the top of the food chain.
translation.zh: 从食物链顶端被除名没什么幸运的

translation.en: Yeah, my parents thought if we could… just make it out of Fairfield,
translation.zh: 对啊 我爸妈还以为我们能从费尔菲尔德逃出来

translation.en: we might have a shot.
translation.zh: 我们就可能有机会活下来

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait.
You're from Fairfield?
Yeah. Why?
Man, I've never met anyone who made it out of Fairfield.
translation.zh: 我从来没见过从费尔菲尔德逃出来的人

translation.en: That place was basically ground zero.
Shit, I've only heard horror stories.
translation.zh: 该死 我听到的都是悲剧

translation.en: Yeah, it was pretty bad.
Your parents, uh…
Oh, uh, no.
[clears throat] No, it's just me.
Couldn't save 'em.
You putting that on yourself?
[sighs] You're from Fairfield, man. You shouldn't even be here. Right?
translation.zh: 你是费尔菲尔德的你本来到不了这里 对吗？

translation.en: You're more of a survivor than I thought.
translation.zh: 你比我想象中的更像个幸存者

translation.en: That's the coolest thing anyone's ever said to me.
translation.zh: 这是我听过的最酷的一句话

translation.en: It's a good start.
Keep it up. Book like this could save someone's life out here.
translation.zh: 坚持画下去 这样的书可以拯救地球上的人

translation.en: Thanks, Clyde.
[Clyde] You, um…
sure your girl's worth it?
Coming all this way?
Yeah.
Yeah, she is.
[Minnow] Don't settle, Joel.
[Clyde] She's right.
You don't have to.
Not even at the end of the world.
-[Boy whines] -[Clyde] Okay!
-Time to break camp! Let's go! -[Joel] Uh, wh--
Lesson two.
You get a hot meal or a good night's sleep.
translation.zh: 吃得了热饭就睡不了好觉

translation.en: -Not both. -Not both.
Are you being serious?
Something will have smelled our food and be all over this camp within the hour.
translation.zh: 怪物会闻到我们的食物不到一个小时就会包围整个营地

translation.en: Why wouldn't you tell me that, though? Uh, I didn't-- I didn't do either.
translation.zh: 那你怎么不告诉我？我没吃好也没睡好

translation.en: I can't tell you everything, man. Keep up.
translation.zh: 我也没法什么都告诉你啊多学着点

translation.en: "Roar! I'm gonna kill you, Joel Dawson! I'm gonna eat you like broccoli!"
translation.zh: “我要杀了你 乔尔道森！我要把你像西兰花一样吃掉！”

translation.en: "I'm Joel, and I can't protect my girlfriend
translation.zh: “我是乔尔 我保护不了我女朋友

translation.en: because I'm useless and insecure and an awkward little teenager."
translation.zh: 因为我既没用又自卑还是个蹩脚的小青年”

translation.en: "But I need you to save me! I thought you loved me."
translation.zh: “但是我要你救我！我还以为你爱我”

translation.en: "But I can't because--" [sputtering, shrieking]
-What? -That's your girlfriend dying.
translation.zh: -什么？-这是你女朋友快死的声音

translation.en: -What? -A needle through water.
A needle through water. Needle through water.
Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo! Yes! See? Bull's-eye!
translation.zh: 太棒了！看到没？正中靶心！

translation.en: Got yourself an admirer there, huh?
translation.zh: 收获了一个小迷妹啊 是吗？

translation.en: Hey, we gotta get going.
Uh, okay. Come on. Come on. We gotta go. We--
translation.zh: 好 快来 我们要走了 我们…

translation.en: Minnow? What are you doing?
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I made friends.
translation.zh: 亲爱的艾米 我交到朋友了

translation.en: Human friends.
And they're teaching me everything they know.
translation.zh: 他们把所有知道的东西都教给了我

translation.en: Like lesson three: Don't take shortcuts.
translation.zh: 就像第三个法则 不要抄近路

translation.en: Lesson eight: Target practice every day.
translation.zh: 第八个法则 每天练习射击

translation.en: Getting pretty good with my crossbow.
translation.zh: 我的十字弓射的很棒了

translation.en: -[Minnow laughs] See? -[Clyde] Pretty good.
Lesson ten: Keep your socks dry. That's a great one.
translation.zh: 第十个法则 保持袜子干爽这一条很不错

translation.en: I'm kinda struggling with lesson two: Not both. That one is not great.
translation.zh: 我还在第二个法则上挣扎 二选一这一条不是特别友好

translation.en: [Clyde] Not both. Not both.
-[clap] -Come on, Joel. Not both.
translation.zh: 快 乔尔 二选一

translation.en: I'm super tired.
All right, a lot of things out here you shouldn't touch or eat,
translation.zh: 是这样的 地表上有很多东西不能碰也不能吃

translation.en: but, uh, ferns like these have an antivenom.
translation.zh: 但这种蕨类植物含有抗蛇毒血清

translation.en: Good in a pinch for snakes, slugs.
translation.zh: 万一被蛇或者蛞蝓咬到很好用

translation.en: -Great entry for your book. -[Joel] Yep, got it.
translation.zh: -很适合收录进你的书-好的 明白

translation.en: The insect-looking ones got no peripheral vision.
translation.zh: 长得像昆虫的怪物没有边缘视觉

translation.en: No peripheral-- Ah!
The lizard-looking ones can't climb for shit.
translation.zh: 长得像蜥蜴的怪物什么都怕不上去

translation.en: The amphibian-looking ones like to hide, lure ya in, eat ya whole.
translation.zh: 长得像两栖动物的 喜欢躲起来引诱你进去 把你吞掉

translation.en: -[grunts] -Then there are the Sandgobblers.
Those guys are badasses.
Badasses!
Yeah, I know. I fell into their hole.
translation.zh: 我知道 我掉进它们的洞里了

translation.en: What you saw were worker bees.
What you wanna avoid under all circumstances is a queen.
translation.zh: 在所有情形下 虫后才是要躲开的

translation.en: How do I know if it's a queen?
Well, your first clue would be a giant fin slicing through the earth,
translation.zh: 第一个线索是划穿地面的巨鳍

translation.en: following every single sound and vibration you make.
translation.zh: 它会跟踪你发出的每个声音和震动

translation.en: -You howling in pain… -[shrieks]
…as you're being ripped in half will be your second.
translation.zh: 痛苦地嚎叫着被撕成两半

translation.en: -[groans] -Copy. I'll keep that in mind.
[Clyde] Well, we're getting close to where our paths diverge.
You're gonna wanna go west to Jenner, the beaches.
translation.zh: 你得往西走才能到詹纳海滩

translation.en: Or you can be sensible, come with us to the mountains.
translation.zh: 你也可以理智点 跟我们去山区

translation.en: Yeah, um, I think I've been sensible all my life,
translation.zh: 我觉得我这辈子都很理智

translation.en: it's really gotten me nowhere.
Come with us. Strength in numbers, you know?
translation.zh: 跟我们一起来吧 人多力量大

translation.en: Besides, think we'd make a good team.
translation.zh: 再说了 我觉得我们会合作得很好

translation.en: No, I think so, too. I just, uh--
translation.zh: 当然 我觉得也是 但是…

translation.en: It's just something I gotta do. It's not fair.
translation.zh: -但是我有必须做的事情-这不公平

translation.en: Wh-- Hey. Wha--
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Whoa, whoa. What's going on?
[crying] Why do you gotta go?
'Cause this girl, she means a lot to me. You know?
translation.zh: 因为那个女孩对我很重要

translation.en: Come on. You know I gotta do this. We talked about this.
translation.zh: 别这样 你知道我必须要去的我们谈过

translation.en: Hey, you know what? I got something for ya.
translation.zh: 嘿 其实我有东西给你

translation.en: I don't even know if you'd know what this is, but--
translation.zh: 我不知道你见没见过这玩意 但是…

translation.en: Lipstick?
-[laughs] What? -Yeah.
-[giggles] -Yeah, it's lip--
I take back what I said before.
Aimee's gonna love you.
Thanks, Minnow. You got some snot.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 米诺 你流鼻涕了

translation.en: -[laughs] Yeah. -[Joel chuckles]
All right. Come on.
[Clyde] Final lesson.
Listen to your instincts out here. They'll keep you alive.
translation.zh: 在这里要听从你的直觉 它们能保命

translation.en: Yeah. What if I have, uh, terrible instincts?
translation.zh: 好的 那如果我的直觉不准呢？

translation.en: You'll die.
Listen, man, good instincts are earned by making mistakes.
translation.zh: 听着 准确的直觉是通过犯错获得的

translation.en: If you're lucky enough to survive a few mistakes,
translation.zh: 如果你足够幸运能在几次错误后活下来

translation.en: you're gonna be okay out here.
translation.zh: 那你就能在地表如鱼得水

translation.en: This might come in handy, too.
translation.zh: 这个可能也会派上用场

translation.en: Wow!
Oh, that's great. Do you have, uh-- Do you have any more that I could have?
translation.zh: 太好了 你还有什么东西给我的吗？

translation.en: You get one.
Pull the pin, count to five. Not four, not six.
translation.zh: 拉出拉环 数到五 不是四也不是六

translation.en: Five.
-Got it. -[sniffs]
You're gonna be okay.
Minnow?
Let's go, kid.
Hey, man, you made it all this way from Fairfield.
translation.zh: 嘿 孩子 你从费尔菲尔德一路走到了这里

translation.en: What's another 30 miles, huh?
translation.zh: 剩下的48公里算什么 对吧？

translation.en: [Clyde] Uh-oh, here he comes.
-Hi. -[Clyde chuckles]
Hey there.
I know. I'm gonna miss 'em, too.
translation.zh: 我知道 我也会想他们的

translation.en: It's a good decision, though. It's good.
translation.zh: 这是个正确的决定 很不错

translation.en: You feel good about it, right?
Come on, Boy.
Aw, I'm okay. I'm just gonna--
You can have that.
I'll just stick to the beans.
-I'm good. -[whines]
I'm not gonna eat that, so…
Hey, come on. We gotta keep moving.
translation.zh: 嘿 跟上啊 我们要继续前进

translation.en: I know. There's a lot of creepy stuff. Creepy boats.
translation.zh: 我知道 这里有很多诡异的东西令人毛骨悚然的船

translation.en: Kind of a creepy sign.
But nothing we haven't seen before.
Just gotta be brave.
-[Boy whines] -What…
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. What's going on? What's happening?
-You okay? -[barks]
-You hearing something? Boy? -[barks]
translation.zh: 你听到什么声音了吗？博伊？

translation.en: Boy, Boy, Boy! Boy!
Hey! Boy! Boy! Boy!
-Boy! Are you okay? -[whines]
I need some kind of communication here.
translation.zh: 我得清楚是怎么回事啊

translation.en: Oh. I hear it.
We gotta go. Hey.
We really gotta go. Please get out from under the duck.
translation.zh: 我们真的得走了 从鸭子下面出来

translation.en: [whispers] We gotta go.
[woman] Joel. You okay?
You okay?
Joel! Get out of the car!
Joel, get outta the car!
Run, Joel, run!
translation.zh: 快跑 乔尔 快跑！

translation.en: Run! Go!
[mother] You can survive this.
I love you.
[echoing] I love you.
No.
Hey!
-[whining] -Boy?
Are you okay?
Yeah! Yeah, you're okay! You're okay!
You're okay. You're okay. You're okay.
Aren't you? Aren't you?
Yeah!
We're monster killers.
Wow.
You know, I haven't felt the rain in seven years.
translation.zh: 我已经七年没淋过雨了

translation.en: Pretty cool. Pretty cool.
Hey, Boy, you think I'm crazy?
translation.zh: 嘿 博伊 你觉得我疯了吗？

translation.en: Coming all this way?
[female electronic voice] Hello.
Holy shit.
You're alive.
I mean… you're on.
I have 51 minutes of power left. What is your name?
translation.zh: 我还剩51分钟的电量 你叫什么？

translation.en: Uh, I'm Joel.
-My name is Joel. -Hello, Joel.
I am so pleased to meet you.
My name is Mavis.
But if you were to write it out,
translation.zh: 但如果你要把它写出来

translation.en: you would write it with a 1 and not an I.
Yeah, I know.
You are familiar with the Mav1s line. Delightful!
translation.zh: 看来你很了解梅薇丝系列 太棒了！

translation.en: You guys were supposed to be the next amazing thing.
translation.zh: 你们本来应该是下一个奇迹

translation.en: I can't believe I'm talkin' to one.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信我正在跟其中一个说话

translation.en: But if you were to write it out,
translation.zh: 但如果你要把它写出来

translation.en: you would write it with a 1 and not an I.
Yeah. You said that.
Years ago, I was bitten in half
translation.zh: 几年以前 我被咬成了两半

translation.en: by something I did not get a chance to name.
translation.zh: 被一种我都没机会起名的物种

translation.en: I crawled here for safety and powered down,
translation.zh: 为了安全我爬到这里 然后关机了

translation.en: hoping someone would one day find me.
translation.zh: 希望有一天能有人找到我

translation.en: -And here you are! -[chuckles softly]
Amazing.
Joel, besides conversing with me, for which I am eternally grateful,
translation.zh: 乔尔 除了和我交谈当然我对此非常感激

translation.en: may I ask what you are doing outside of your colony?
translation.zh: 我能问问你为什么在避难所外吗？

translation.en: Yeah, um--
Did you steal food?
No.
No, I didn't steal any food.
Um, I'm actually on a quest… to find a girl.
translation.zh: 我其实要去找一个女孩

translation.en: Why, Joel, a lovely lady has caught your eye!
translation.zh: 天啊 乔尔 一位可爱的女士俘获了你的心！

translation.en: What is her name?
Uh, her name's Aimee. With one I and two E's.
translation.zh: 她叫艾米 草字头的艾 大米的米

translation.en: She sounds like an incredible person, Joel.
translation.zh: 她听起来是个了不起的人 乔尔

translation.en: Is there anything I can do to assist you
translation.zh: 在你寻找艾米 草字头的艾大米的米的过程中

translation.en: in your quest for Aimee with one I and two E's?
Nope. Appreciate it, Mav1s, but, uh, unfortunately not.
translation.zh: 不用了 很感谢你 梅薇丝但确实没什么可帮的

translation.en: Unless you happen to have a power source to an SK-21 ham radio handy.
translation.zh: 除非你正好有能连接到SK-21业余无线电台上的电源

translation.en: Oh, no, but--
I would be honored to donate my remaining power to you
translation.zh: 我很荣幸将剩余电量赠予你

translation.en: if it would help you with your quest for Aimee with one I and two E's.
translation.zh: 如果它能够帮助你寻找艾米 草字头的艾 大米的米的话

translation.en: She probably thinks I've been devoured by now.
translation.zh: 她可能觉得我现在已经在怪物的肚子里了

translation.en: Oh, this is all so exciting!
-It's working. -Hooray!
-[Aimee] Joel? -Aimee! Hey. Hey.
Your colony told me you were coming here. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你避难所里的人告诉我你要来找我 你还好吧？

translation.en: I was worried. It's so good to hear your voice.
translation.zh: 我很担心 听到你的声音太好了

translation.en: Yeah, it's good to hear yours, too. Yeah, I'm alive. I'm good. I'm okay.
translation.zh: 是啊 我也很高兴听到你的声音对 我还活着 我很好 我没事

translation.en: I-I-I can't believe you're actually doing this.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信你真要这么做

translation.en: I know. It's crazy. Aimee, I cannot wait to tell you everything.
translation.zh: 我知道 真的很难以置信 艾米我等不及要告诉你一切了

translation.en: I feel like a whole new man, you know?
translation.zh: 我觉得自己简直焕然一新

translation.en: You should see me out here. I'm fighting monsters.
translation.zh: 你真应该看看我在地表的样子我都与怪物搏斗了

translation.en: I'm in a motel right now with a robot and a dog.
translation.zh: 现在我正和一个机器人一只狗待在汽车旅馆

translation.en: What? That sounds crazy.
translation.zh: 现在我正和一个机器人一只狗待在汽车旅馆 什么？听起来很不可思议

translation.en: How far are you from Jenner Beach?
translation.zh: 你离詹纳海滩还有多远？

translation.en: Um, how far? I'm getting close. I'm, um…
translation.zh: 多远？越来越近了 我…

translation.en: I'm 9.3 miles to you.
Joel, listen. I have amazing news.
translation.zh: 乔尔 你听着 我有个非常好的消息

translation.en: Some survivors showed up a few days ago, and they're rescuing us.
translation.zh: 几天前有几个幸存者来了他们要营救我们

translation.en: They're gonna get us out of here!
translation.zh: 他们要带我们离开这里了！

translation.en: They're really helping me with the colony.
translation.zh: 他们在帮我解决避难所的问题

translation.en: Oh. Okay, g-getting you out of there? What do you mean?
translation.zh: 带你们离开那里？你说什么？

translation.en: I can't remember the last time I actually felt like everything was going to be--
translation.zh: 我都忘了上次我感觉一切都…

translation.en: Wh-- Aimee? Aimee? Aimee?
Shit.
My battery has automatically shut down
translation.zh: 我的电池已经自动断电

translation.en: in order to preserve my final 15 minutes of power.
translation.zh: 以保留我最后15分钟的电量

translation.en: -I am very sorry, Joel. -No, it's okay, Mav1s.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 乔尔 不用 没关系 梅薇丝 你不必…

translation.en: -You don't have to… -[thunder rumbling]
translation.zh: 不用 没关系 梅薇丝 你不必…

translation.en: Joel?
I haven't been outside in a very long time.
translation.zh: 我已经好长时间没出去了

translation.en: Yeah. I hadn't, either.
-There you go. -Is something troubling you, Joel?
translation.zh: -好了-你有什么心事吗 乔尔？

translation.en: You can tell me anything, as I am an empathetic listener.
translation.zh: 你可以告诉我任何事情因为我是个富有同情心的倾听者

translation.en: Also, my memory banks will be permanently erased in 14 minutes.
translation.zh: 而且 我的记忆库14分钟后就被永久删除了

translation.en: You know that feeling where you just completely put yourself out there?
translation.zh: 你知道完全放手一搏的感觉吗？

translation.en: You know? And you're so sure of it.
And… right when you're about to cross the finish line,
translation.zh: 当你马上要完成的时候

translation.en: you just think is this the dumbest… thing I ever could've done?
translation.zh: 你突然会想这会不会是你做过的最蠢的事情？

translation.en: I don't think it's dumb, Joel.
translation.zh: 我不觉得这很蠢 乔尔

translation.en: I think it's romantic.
Right, see? Yeah, okay, you get it.
translation.zh: 对吧 看吧？没错 你懂的

translation.en: Romantic, that's what-- Yeah.
Do not give up on your quest, Joel.
translation.zh: 不要放弃你的寻找之旅 乔尔

translation.en: When you see her, she will appreciate the grand romantic gesture
translation.zh: 等你见到她后你踏上这趟旅程的伟大示爱之举

translation.en: implied by your journey
and be moved by your kindness and leadership qualities.
translation.zh: 她也会被你的善良和领导品质打动

translation.en: Thanks, Mav1s.
Another option is that Aimee will not see those qualities in you
translation.zh: 还有一种可能是艾米没有机会看到这些品质

translation.en: and you will have traveled a great distance
only to be met with disappointment.
Perhaps you will have learned valuable lessons along the way?
translation.zh: 至少你这一路上获得了不少宝贵经验呢 是吧？

translation.en: Okay.
A third option is that you don't survive the journey at all
translation.zh: 第三种可能是你根本没能活过这段旅程

translation.en: and get eaten by mutated insects…
translation.zh: 被变异的昆虫、两栖动物…

translation.en: -Okay, that's-- I get it. -…amphibians--
translation.zh: -好了 真是…我懂了-吃掉了…

translation.en: There are so many ways you could perish.
translation.zh: 你死亡的方式有很多种

translation.en: I get it.
Thanks for the…
Thanks for that.
Would you like to see a trick, Joel?
translation.zh: 给你看个好玩的怎么样 乔尔？

translation.en: Sure.
What is your full name, and where were you born?
translation.zh: 你的全名是什么？你的出生地是哪里？

translation.en: Uh, Joel Dawson. Fairfield, California.
translation.zh: 乔尔道森 加州费尔菲尔德

translation.en: What lovely parents you had, Joel.
translation.zh: 你的父母真和蔼啊 乔尔

translation.en: [Joel] Oh, my God.
Wow.
I don't even have a picture.
What would you say to your mother now, Joel,
translation.zh: 乔尔 如果现在有机会的话

translation.en: if you had the chance?
translation.zh: 你会对你的妈妈说什么？

translation.en: I guess I'd tell her I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我想我会跟她说我没事

translation.en: I made it to a colony.
Met a lot of really, really good people
who took really good care of me.
They also lost a lot, so…
translation.zh: 他们也失去了很多 所以…

translation.en: [crying] And I miss you guys so much.
I'm so sorry.
Oh, look! Sky Jellies!
They're harmless and quite lovely.
translation.zh: 它们是无害的 而且非常可爱

translation.en: Wow.
Oh! Canis familiaris!
You found my foot. Thank you.
translation.zh: 你找到了我的一只脚 谢谢你

translation.en: -That's my dog. -He's delightful.
[Joel] Yeah, he's a good boy.
-Joel, would you like to hear a song? -[humming, chirping continue]
translation.zh: 乔尔 你想听首歌吗？

translation.en: [Joel] Yeah, okay.
You know, nature's kinda nice when there's nothing trying to kill you.
translation.zh: 没有东西想杀掉你时大自然还是挺美好的

translation.en: Mav1s?
Thanks.
[Joel] Some survivors showed up at the camp.
That's not something I gotta worry about, you don't think, right?
translation.zh: 这也没什么好担心的 对吧？

translation.en: I mean, what are the odds that they're, like, awesome
translation.zh: 他们很优秀、和我年龄相仿而且对我的爱情有潜在威胁

translation.en: and similar to my age and potentially a threat to me romantically?
Slim to none, probably.
I think it's good, actually. I think we're totally, uh… fine.
translation.zh: 我觉得挺好的 对我们完全没影响

translation.en: Actually, why don't we pick up the pace a little bit, just in case--
translation.zh: 我们加快点速度吧 以防万一…

translation.en: Okay, you know what?
Why don't we go another way. Yeah?
translation.zh: 不如我们走另一条路 行吗？

translation.en: Boy? Boy!
Boy, where you going?
Queen.
Run, Boy! Run!
-[Boy yips] -Get--
-Go, go! Go! -[yipping continues]
[shouts] Wait!
Boy!
Boy, I can't run that fast! [gasping]
translation.zh: 博伊 我跑不了那么快！

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, I'm so sorry.
I'm sorry.
[whispers] What are you doing?
Don't you dare.
-Whoa, whoa. What are you doing? -[yips]
No. Wait, Boy!
translation.zh: 不要 等等 博伊！

translation.en: Boy!
-[whimpers] -Boy, don't even think about it.
Don't. Don't you do it.
-Don't. Don't. No! -[barks]
Count to five.
One, two--
Shit!
Two. Uh, three, four…
five!
Yes!
Yes! Oh, my God!
Oh, that was awesome.
I feel like Tom Cruise. [gasps]
translation.zh: 我就像汤姆克鲁斯一样

translation.en: [grunts] Oh! Ow. What the hell is--
Oh, my God.
Get that dress out of my face!
translation.zh: 把这裙子从我眼前拿开！

translation.en: Boy?
Okay.
Oh, no.
Okay, all right, I think I'm good.
translation.zh: 好吧 我觉得我没事

translation.en: I think I got 'em all.
What?
God! No! [grunting]
[shouting] You! You! You!
This is all your fault! What is wrong with you?
translation.zh: 都是你的错！你有毛病吗？

translation.en: Why don't you listen to me, huh? Huh?
You have any idea what you just did? You almost got us killed!
translation.zh: 你知道你刚刚做了什么吗？你差点害死我们！

translation.en: We are supposed to care about each other, okay?
translation.zh: 我们本应该互相照顾 对吗？

translation.en: I would never do that to you, never! You bailed on me! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我绝不会这样对你的！你抛弃了我！ 我的天啊！那条破裙子！我受不了了！

translation.en: That freakin' dress! I can't take it anymore!
translation.zh: 我的天啊！那条破裙子！我受不了了！

translation.en: [Joel] Dear Aimee, it's not looking good.
translation.zh: 亲爱的艾米 情况不太妙

translation.en: And by "it," I don't remember what I was talking about.
translation.zh: 说到“情况” 我已经不记得我刚刚说过什么了

translation.en: I can't feel my feet.
Or my face.
I think I'm dying.
[Minnow] I'm gonna kill you, Joel Dawson! I'm gonna eat you like broccoli!
translation.zh: “我要杀了你乔尔道森！我要把你像西兰花一样吃掉！”

translation.en: [Clyde] Ferns like these have an antivenom.
translation.zh: 这种蕨类植物含有抗蛇毒血清

translation.en: -Good in a pinch for snakes, slugs. -[gasping]
translation.zh: 万一被蛇或者蛞蝓咬到很好用

translation.en: [Joel] If you find the best dog ever,
translation.zh: 如果你找到了最好的狗狗

translation.en: that's Boy.
Please, look after him.
Tell him I'm sorry.
-[whispering] Have you seen my dog? -Tell him I love him.
translation.zh: 你见过我的狗吗？ 告诉它我爱它

translation.en: Have you seen him? I yelled at him.
translation.zh: 你看见它了没有？我把它骂跑了

translation.en: Don't take his dress out of his mouth. He doesn't like that.
translation.zh: 别拿走它嘴里叼的裙子它不喜欢这样

translation.en: And now I might not ever see him again.
translation.zh: 我可能再也见不到它了

translation.en: And please don't shout at him. I know you won't.
translation.zh: 拜托不要吼它 我知道你不会的

translation.en: Joel.
Oh, my God.
-It's you. -Aimee?
I can't believe you made it.
Oh, my God. I can't believe you made it.
translation.zh: 天啊 我不敢相信你做到了

translation.en: You made it, Joel.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, yeah.
Oh, you're so beautiful.
That was nice.
Aimee?
Aimee.
-Aimee. -Hey, hey, hey, hey. T-T-Take it easy. Take it easy.
Still pretty messed up from all the poison. How do you feel?
translation.zh: 你的毒还没解 你感觉怎么样？

translation.en: I feel-- I'm good.
Good. No, I'm f-- I-I'm okay.
translation.zh: 很好 不用 我没事

translation.en: What was it like? I mean, you have to tell me everything.
translation.zh: 一路上怎么样？你得全都告诉我

translation.en: Honestly, it wasn't that bad. I don't know what everyone's complaining about.
translation.zh: 说实话 感觉没那么可怕我都不知道大家在抱怨什么

translation.en: -Oh? -No, it was terrible.
I almost… died a lot.
It's so good to see you.
I'm lucky you found me when you did.
About that, um…
And hey, we… kissed.
-You were hallucinating pretty hard. -How amazing was that, huh?
translation.zh: -你当时的幻觉很严重-真是太棒了 对吧？

translation.en: You kissed Old Pete.
-Hi, Pete. -Oh. Yeah.
That'd be hilarious.
translation.zh: 真那样的话可就逗死了

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I really did.
I don't know how to move on from this.
What was that you said on the radio about, uh--
translation.zh: 你在无线电上说的关于…

translation.en: Yeah. This yacht captain and his crew show up out of the blue.
translation.zh: 对 游艇船长和他的船员突然出现了

translation.en: -Did you say a yacht captain? -Yeah, yeah.
And he says he can find us a safe place to live and a new home.
translation.zh: 他说他能帮我们找到一个安全的地方 一个新家

translation.en: I'm trying to pack everything up right now.
translation.zh: 我正想把所有东西打包好

translation.en: Why is he called a yacht captain?
translation.zh: 为什么他叫游艇船长呢？

translation.en: 'Cause he's the captain of the yacht, you moron.
translation.zh: 因为他就是游艇的船长啊 笨蛋

translation.en: Oh, my God. Be nice, Bill.
translation.zh: 天啊 友好点 比尔

translation.en: -What? -I'm trying to listen.
So anyway, I just wanted to say something to you, though--
translation.zh: 总之 我想跟你说件事…

translation.en: Aimee! Aimee! We got another leak in the main line.
Bastard's spitting freshwater all over the beach!
translation.zh: 那破水管把淡水洒遍沙滩了！

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, thank you, Janice. I'll be right there.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你 珍妮丝 我马上过去

translation.en: -Oh. -Hi, Joel.
Hey, Janice. Good to meet you.
translation.zh: 嘿 珍妮丝 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -Please-- -Everyone's so old.
-[laughs] You came at a crazy time. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你正好在混乱的时候来了-对啊

translation.en: -Can we put a pin in this? -Yeah.
[whispers] Put a pin in it. Sure.
Hey, man.
[Janice] It's all falling apart, Aimee.
I don't know what's happening here. What can we do?
translation.zh: 我也不知道怎么回事我们该怎么做？

translation.en: [Aimee] Yeah, I know, Janice. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对 我知道 珍妮丝 抱歉

translation.en: Janice, will you just-- Will you give me the wrench?
translation.zh: 珍妮丝 你可以…你可以把扳手给我吗？

translation.en: -[Janice] This is a shitshow. -[wave crashes]
Who left the kelp out in the sun? That was meant to be packed up already.
translation.zh: 谁把海带放在阳光下的？本来应该已经打包好了

translation.en: -It's gonna bring in the flies. -[man] It's swellin' up.
translation.zh: 谁把海带放在阳光下的？本来应该已经打包好了 -它会招苍蝇的-它肿了

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think feet are meant to be that color.
translation.zh: 是啊 我觉得脚不该是那种颜色

translation.en: Hey.
Perfect timing.
Guys! Joel, this is Dana and Rocko.
translation.zh: 各位！乔尔 他们是黛娜和洛克

translation.en: -What's up? -These are the guys from the yacht.
Cool. Oh.
Is that a-- Is that an arm cannon?
Homemade.
So which one-- Which one of you is the yacht captain?
Guilty as charged. Captain Brooks Wilkinson.
translation.zh: 本人在此 布鲁克斯威尔金森船长

translation.en: -Royal Australian Navy. -Oh, dear God.
translation.zh: -澳大利亚皇家海军-我的天啊

translation.en: Retired, of course. My mates call me Cap. How you doing, man?
translation.zh: 当然 已经退役了我的朋友们都叫我船长 你好

translation.en: I see you've met these specimens, but this beautiful lady, that's our yacht.
translation.zh: 我看你已经见过这两个家伙了那位美丽的女士 那是我们的游艇

translation.en: A little showy for my taste, but she gets the job done.
translation.zh: 我觉得它有点花里胡哨但是它的任务完成得不错

translation.en: -Huh. -Cap, this is Joel. Joel. Right.
translation.zh: -船长 这是乔尔-乔尔 好的

translation.en: Joel ended up traveling seven days on the surface to get here.
translation.zh: 乔尔在地表长途跋涉了七天到了这里

translation.en: -Seven days? -Seven-- Yeah, seven days.
-That is one hell of a journey, Joel. -It was. Yeah.
translation.zh: -真是长度跋涉啊 乔尔-的确

translation.en: I don't get it. Why'd you leave your colony, Joel?
translation.zh: 我不明白你为什么离开避难所 乔尔？

translation.en: You get caught stealing food?
translation.zh: -你被抓到偷食物了？-没有 我没有被抓到偷食物

translation.en: No, I didn't get caught stealing food. Why is that such a thing?
translation.zh: -你被抓到偷食物了？-没有 我没有被抓到偷食物 -这件事很重要吗？-他是为爱而来的

translation.en: He came for love.
translation.zh: -这件事很重要吗？-他是为爱而来的

translation.en: Good on ya, mate. That's beautiful.
translation.zh: 好样的 兄弟 太美好了

translation.en: There is no mission more admirable than love.
translation.zh: 没有比爱情更令人钦佩的任务

translation.en: Every sailor worth his salt knows that.
translation.zh: 每一位称职的海员都知道这一点

translation.en: Yo, Cap. We cooking this shit or what?
translation.zh: 船长 我们到底还煮不煮了？

translation.en: Feel like I got King Kong's nuts on my shoulders, man.
translation.zh: 我感觉肩上像驮着金刚的蛋蛋 船长

translation.en: That's charming, Rock, really.
translation.zh: 你这话很粗鲁 洛克

translation.en: Joel, you look like a man who knows his way around a barbecue.
translation.zh: 乔尔 你看起来像个很懂做烧烤的人

translation.en: -I… don't-- -Come help us get a fire started.
Um, actually, I'm gonna…
-catch up with Aimee for a sec, if it's… -Yeah.
translation.zh: -跟艾米叙叙旧 如果…-对啊

translation.en: [Cap] I apologize. I-- Old habits.
translation.zh: 我的错 我…老毛病了

translation.en: You show up and… here I am trying to give you orders.
translation.zh: 你才来没多久 我就想对你发号施令

translation.en: I'll give you guys some privacy, yeah?
-Thank you. -Yeah, namaste.
Uh, I was gonna just, if you--
-Hey, Joel. -Yeah?
We're throwing a killer going-away party tonight. Nothing fancy, but…
translation.zh: 我们今晚要举办一场怪物送别会没什么特别的 但是…

translation.en: we'll have a drink together to welcome you to the colony.
translation.zh: 我们一起喝点酒 欢迎你来避难所

translation.en: Okay.
First beer's on me.
Thanks.
He's nice.
Brews his own beer.
-[Joel] Oh. -Hello, darling. How are you?
translation.zh: 你好 亲爱的 你好吗？

translation.en: Course he does.
I'm sorry. There's just so much going on right now.
translation.zh: 抱歉 最近事情太多了

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Yeah.
It's crazy.
Pretty nice here, you know.
Why, uh… why do you have to leave?
-It's beautiful. It's just not safe. -Right.
translation.zh: -这里是不错 只是不安全-对

translation.en: Everyone's afraid.
Even your bunker got breached and you're all young and strong.
translation.zh: 连你的地堡都被攻破了你们还都是年轻力壮的

translation.en: Yeah.
Hey, Aimee?
Sorry. I know you got, like, a lot going on, but, uh…
translation.zh: 抱歉 我知道你有很多事情要处理 但是

translation.en: you know, I came-- I came all the way here to see you,
and so I'm just…
checkin' in.
Just wondering how you're… feeling about that.
translation.zh: 不知道你对此有什么想法

translation.en: I think it's the most romantic thing anyone's ever done.
translation.zh: 我觉得这是史上最浪漫的事情

translation.en: You do? Okay. Okay, good, 'cause, um--
translation.zh: 是吗？好吧 太好了 因为…

translation.en: But listen, Joel, um…
talking to you on the radio was such a nice escape
translation.zh: 在无线电上和你说话是很好

translation.en: from the stress of running this colony.
translation.zh: 这能帮我逃避管理这里的压力

translation.en: Yeah.
And, um…
I mean, you're probably the only person left alive from my old life.
translation.zh: 你可能是唯一一个我过去生活里生还的人

translation.en: From Fairfield.
Oh. There's a… there's a "but" coming, isn't there?
translation.zh: 你要说“但是”了 是吗？

translation.en: But I didn't think you'd actually come here, Joel.
translation.zh: 但我没想到你真的会来这里 乔尔

translation.en: And I am so happy to see you.
I'm just not--
I'm not the same person that I used to be, you know?
translation.zh: 我不是以前的我了 你懂吗？

translation.en: Seven years, that's a long time.
I've-- I've lost people. My mom, my friends, and--
translation.zh: 我失去了很多人我妈妈 我的朋友们 还有…

translation.en: Last year I lost someone…
and he meant a lot to me.
Oh, man, I feel like such an idiot.
translation.zh: 天啊 我觉得自己是个白痴

translation.en: -No. No, don't. -I didn't even--
I didn't even ask you if I should come.
translation.zh: 我都没问你我该不该来

translation.en: I just got so excited, and I-- I left.
I don't know what I thought.
translation.zh: 我不知道我当时怎么想的

translation.en: Well, I know what I thought.
I'd come and… and sweep you off your feet,
translation.zh: 我会来找你 让你为我迷倒

translation.en: and we'd be happy.
Oh, Joel.
But you… didn't w-want… me.
I am so sorry. I should have said something on the radio or--
translation.zh: 对不起 我应该在无线电里跟你说几句的 或者…

translation.en: No. It's okay. It's okay. Um…
I know this isn't how you pictured this going, but…
translation.zh: 我知道你没想到事情会这样发展 但是…

translation.en: you'll still come with us, right?
translation.zh: 你还是会跟我们一起走 对吗？

translation.en: Come with you-- Uh, on the… yacht?
This is our shot at survival.
Give Cap a chance.
-[Cap muttering] -Tell us.
[Bill] Yeah, come on, Cap. Tell us another story.
translation.zh: 对啊 快 船长 再讲一个故事

translation.en: -[Janice] Yeah, come on. -Four years post-Agatha.
translation.zh: -对啊 来嘛-阿加莎被炸毁的第四年

translation.en: HMS Brisbane. First watch.
translation.zh: 布里斯班号皇家海军舰艇第一班岗

translation.en: I was the first person to see it coming over the wall.
translation.zh: 我是第一个看到它翻墙而来的

translation.en: -Giant lizard, two stories high. -[all gasping]
translation.zh: 巨型蜥蜴 两层楼高

translation.en: I sounded the alarm.
Too late.
-We lost 1,032 souls that night. -[all gasping]
Those of us that survived took to the sea.
translation.zh: 我们中幸存下来的人就依海而生了

translation.en: I mean, make no mistake. We have lost this war. Right?
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 这场战争我们输了 对吗？

translation.en: There is no place for mankind on land. But out there?
translation.zh: 陆地上没有人类生存的地方了但在那里呢？

translation.en: There we got a chance.
[clears throat] I've got a--
Sorry. Just got a… question.
I survived seven days on the surface,
and… if I can do that, literally anyone can.
translation.zh: 如果我能做到的话 任何人都可以

translation.en: Seven days on the surface? I'm impressed.
translation.zh: 在地表活了七天？我很佩服你

translation.en: So maybe we still have a chance… to fight
translation.zh: 所以也许我们还有机会战斗

translation.en: and-- and, you know, win, uh… win our-- win our world back.
I have a plan. And if you have a better one, mate, I'm-- I'm all ears.
translation.zh: 我有个计划 如果你有更好的兄弟 我洗耳恭听

translation.en: -And I will stand by your side. -You wanna hear my--
translation.zh: 我会支持你的 你想听我的计划吗？

translation.en: -You wanna hear my plan? -[scattered] Yeah.
translation.zh: 你想听我的计划吗？ -对-对

translation.en: [Joel] It's, uh…
just, uh…
I got nothing, uh… [clears throat]
Hey, that's on me.
I-I didn't mean to put you on the spot, mate. It's--
translation.zh: 我不是故意让你为难的 伙计 只是…

translation.en: Well-- [chuckles] Aimee tells me you make a mean minestrone.
translation.zh: 艾米跟我说你做的意大利杂菜汤很好吃

translation.en: And you're great on the radio.
translation.zh: 你也很擅长电台的东西

translation.en: Lord knows I need a comms expert.
translation.zh: 天知道我多需要通讯专家

translation.en: -Someone to teach Rocko how to cook. -[all laughing]
Do you guys have a radio I can use? I want to contact my colony.
translation.zh: 你们有能用的无线电吗？我想联系我的避难所

translation.en: 7045, this is 3022. Come in.
7045, this is 3022. Is anyone there?
Tim? Ava? Anyone. Over.
translation.zh: 蒂姆？艾娃？谁都可以 请回答

translation.en: Cap thought you might need a snack.
translation.zh: 船长说你可能需要零食

translation.en: -Oh. -You know, he brews his own beer.
-Yep. Yeah, I heard. -It's good, man.
-Cool. Thank you. -Yeah.
[Ray] Hello? Is someone there?
Hey. Yeah! Yeah!
Yeah, Ray, is that you? It's me. It's Joel.
translation.zh: 雷 是你吗？是我 乔尔

translation.en: Joel? [chuckling] Oh, my God!
-Hey, guys! It's Joel. He made it! -[all chattering on radio]
translation.zh: 嘿 伙计们！是乔尔 他成功了！

translation.en: -[Tim] You're kidding! -Hey. Hey, guys!
It's me. It's Joel. I'm-- I'm-- I'm safe.
translation.zh: 是我 我是乔尔 我很安全

translation.en: I-I made it. I'm at Aimee's colony.
translation.zh: 我成功了 我就在艾米的避难所

translation.en: -[Tim] He made it! -[Kala] My God, you're alive?
translation.zh: -他成功了！-天啊 你还活着？

translation.en: -It's so good to hear you guys' voices. -[Tim] Good to hear you, too, buddy.
translation.zh: -能听到你们的声音太好了-也很高兴听到你的 伙计

translation.en: -[Kala] Are you okay? -I feel like it's been so long.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-我感觉已经过了很久了

translation.en: -I got so much to tell you guys. -[Kala] Tell us what you've seen.
translation.zh: -我有很多话要告诉你们-跟我们讲讲你见到了什么

translation.en: -I saw a queen Sandgobbler. -[Tim] What's a queen Sandgobbler?
translation.zh: -我见到了一个沙丘虫后-什么是沙丘虫后？

translation.en: It's-- I don't know, but I blew it up. I blew it up with a hand grenade!
translation.zh: 我不知道 但我炸掉它了我用手榴弹把它炸开花了！

translation.en: -Can you believe that? -[Ray] Where'd you get a grenade?
translation.zh: -你们能相信吗？-你从哪弄来的手榴弹？

translation.en: Yeah, it was so awesome, and--
translation.zh: 是啊 太棒了 还有…

translation.en: What else? What else? Uh, I met these two really cool survivors.
translation.zh: 还有什么来着？ 我遇到了两个很酷的幸存者

translation.en: And they taught me all these things. They live on the surface and--
translation.zh: 他们教会了我所有东西他们在地表上生活…

translation.en: And, oh, oh, oh! I met a Mav1s.
translation.zh: 噢 我见到了一个梅薇丝

translation.en: -I talked to a real-life Mav1s. -[Kala] No way! What's she like?
translation.zh: -我跟一个能动的梅薇丝说话了-不是吧！它是什么样的？

translation.en: Uh, she was… very informative, emotionally, and…
And I got a dog too, um…
-[Ray] Wow, Joel. You got a dog? -[Kala] And how is it with Aimee?
translation.zh: -哇 乔尔 你捡了只狗？-你和艾米怎么样？

translation.en: Uh, really…
really good.
[Kala] Joel, you simply surviving that journey, it's incredible.
translation.zh: 乔尔 你在旅途中活了下来太不可思议了

translation.en: [Ray] We're proud of you, Joel.
translation.zh: 我们为你感到骄傲 乔尔

translation.en: Man, I really miss you guys.
translation.zh: 天啊 我真的很想你们

translation.en: How is, uh-- How is everything back there? Give me the update.
translation.zh: 那里的情况怎么样？跟我说说最新的情况

translation.en: [Ray] Not good. We've had multiple breaches.
translation.zh: 不太好 我们被遭到了好几次入侵

translation.en: Multiple breaches? What do you mean? Is everyone okay?
translation.zh: 好几次入侵？你说什么？大家都没事吧？

translation.en: Not really. I don't think we can stay here much longer.
translation.zh: 不太好 我想我们不会在这里待太久

translation.en: Uh, guys?
[Ray] We're surviving for now.
"Surviving for now." What? Sur-- Ray? Hey, guys!
translation.zh: “暂时还活着” 什么？ 雷？嘿 伙计们！

translation.en: -[static] -Hey, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. Shit.
translation.zh: 嘿 不要啊 该死 在吗？大家能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: -Hello, guys, can you hear me? -[static crackling]
translation.zh: 该死 在吗？大家能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: Guys?
I gotta go back.
What am I doing here?
Purple berries.
[Cap] Giant lizard, two stories high, coming over the wall.
translation.zh: 两层楼高的巨型蜥蜴 翻墙而过

translation.en: [Clyde] The lizard-looking ones can't climb for shit.
translation.zh: 长得像蜥蜴的怪物什么都怕不上去

translation.en: Lying son of a bitch.
Son of a bitch!
Y'all like this shit, huh?
translation.zh: 你们都喜欢这个 是吗？

translation.en: Aimee.
-[both laughing] -Hey, hey. Aimee, Aimee, Aimee.
-Joel! -Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. Hey.
-[whispering] I have to talk to you. -Joel!
Oh, you're so drunk.
translation.zh: -你喝了好多-我火辣的、性感的

translation.en: Hot, super ripped, super awesome Joely-Joely Dawson!
translation.zh: -你喝了好多-我火辣的、性感的 超级厉害的小乔尔道森！

translation.en: -[giggles] -Aimee, please.
translation.zh: 艾米 拜托 这很重要

translation.en: This is super important. I need to talk to you about something.
translation.zh: 艾米 拜托 这很重要 我要跟你说件事

translation.en: You have to get everyone out of here right now.
translation.zh: 你必须要马上带所有人离开这里

translation.en: Okay, I think something bad is about to happen. I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 好吧 我觉得要发生不好的事了 我跟你说 我能感觉出来我有不详的预感

translation.en: I can feel it. This is a bad-- This is a bad vibe.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 我能感觉出来我有不详的预感

translation.en: I think he's planning something. I don't think he's here to save you.
translation.zh: 我觉得他有什么阴谋我觉得他不是来救你们的

translation.en: -Who? -The yacht captain. He tried to poison me.
translation.zh: -谁？-游艇船长 他想毒死我

translation.en: Cap. Cap's right there. He's dancing.
translation.zh: 船长就在那 他在跳舞

translation.en: Oh, my-- I hate him. I hate him so much.
Listen, he gave me these poison berries, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 他让我吃有毒的浆果

translation.en: I know that the berries are poison because my dog told me.
translation.zh: 我知道那些浆果有毒因为我的狗告诉我了

translation.en: You have a talking dog?
-No, no, no, Aimee. -I love dogs!
[Aimee] What does he say? Where is the little fella?
translation.zh: 它说什么了？那小家伙在哪里？

translation.en: Please. Please try to listen to me.
I need your help. Something's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 我需要你的帮助 有事情要发生

translation.en: Your colony, they're in danger.
-Joel. -What?
-Joel! -[grunts]
Oh, shit.
-Aimee? Aimee? -Joel? Joel, are you okay?
[Cap] Good morning.
Joel, I'm sorry about the fist to your face.
translation.zh: 乔尔 很抱歉打了你的脸一拳

translation.en: I couldn't have you talking shit about us on the radio. I didn't wanna mess this up.
translation.zh: 我不能让你在无线电里胡说八道

translation.en: -[grunting] -Dana, take care of it.
translation.zh: 我不想让我的计划泡汤 黛娜 动手

translation.en: Dana, d-don't. Not the radio tower!
translation.zh: 黛娜 不要 别毁掉无线电塔！

translation.en: -[man] What are you doing? -[woman] Are you crazy?
So, you probably figured out we're not on a pleasure cruise.
translation.zh: 你可能发现了我们并不是在乘船观光

translation.en: My crew and I want to thank you for your generous donations.
translation.zh: 我的船员和我想感谢你们的慷慨解囊

translation.en: Food, water, supplies, medicine.
We greatly appreciate it.
It will see us through to the next helpless colony down the coast.
translation.zh: 它们会帮助我们撑到下一个无助的沿海避难所

translation.en: [man] He's a food stealer!
-You're right. -[man] Yeah.
But it's not that simple. The world is basically devoid of fossil fuels.
translation.zh: 但这没那么简单 世界上基本没有矿物燃料了

translation.en: Not enough to run a yacht on, anyway.
translation.zh: 不足以让一艘游艇航行了

translation.en: So my crew and I, we had to improvise just to survive.
translation.zh: 所以我的船员和我为了生存不得不临时凑合

translation.en: And we found a real special fuel source. Actually, Rocko did.
translation.zh: 我们找到了一种非常特殊的燃料来源

translation.en: -Didn't ya, big fella? -Yeah, that was me.
translation.zh: -其实是洛克找到的 对吗？-对 是我找的

translation.en: Ten tons of pure power, chained to the front of that yacht.
translation.zh: 十吨重的纯动力 拴在游艇的前部

translation.en: She's sleeping now.
She will be hungry soon.
What?
Well, what can I say?
Shit gets crazy in the apocalypse.
Oh, my God.
[woman] You can't do this!
-[Aimee] Oh, my God. -[all screaming]
Run!
-Rose! -[screaming continues]
-[growling] -Oh, my God, we're gonna die.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 我们死定了

translation.en: M'kay. Just gotta find a way to free my hands from the--
translation.zh: 好吧 我要想办法解开我的手…

translation.en: I have to stop these bastards from taking our stuff!
translation.zh: 我要阻止那几个混蛋拿走我的东西！

translation.en: Oh, my-- [shouts]
You traveled 85 miles across hell. I think I can stop three assholes.
translation.zh: 你穿越了137公里的地狱我想我也能阻止三个混蛋

translation.en: -You get the crab! -What?
This is desperate.
-Aimee? -[roaring continues]
Holy shit. [gasps]
-Holy shit. -[roaring continues]
-[roaring continues] -No, no, no, no, no!
Boy? Boy!
-Boy! Hey! -[barking continues]
Dana? Shoot the dog.
[Joel] Aimee!
-[Aimee grunts] -[Joel] No!
Rocko? Time to go. Let's mo--
-Oh, no, you don't. -[switch clicks]
Boy! I need you to listen to me right now.
translation.zh: 博伊！我要你现在听我说

translation.en: You see over there? Go get Aimee.
translation.zh: 你看到那边了吗？ 去救艾米

translation.en: Let's move it!
Go now. Now. Now!
I'm sorry I yelled at you!
Move.
Okay, crab, you want some of--
translation.zh: 好了 大螃蟹 你要来点…

translation.en: Okay! Whoa! Whoa!
Hey, hey, hey, hey! Listen. You don't wanna do this.
translation.zh: 嘿！听着 你不想这样的

translation.en: -[Janice screaming] -Oh, no!
-Joel! -Aimee!
Aimee! Aimee, throw me the cannon! I know how to kill it!
translation.zh: 艾米 把加农炮给我！我知道怎么杀死它！

translation.en: You can always tell in the eyes.
-What are you doing? Shoot it! -Shoot it! What are you waiting for?
translation.zh: -你在做什么？ 开炮啊！-开炮啊！ 你在等什么？

translation.en: -[Janice] Kill it! -[Bill] Goddamn it, shoot it!
Needle through water.
Cap?
-You're free. -[growling]
Oh, my God.
Oh, shit, we're gonna die. We're dying.
translation.zh: 该死 我们死定了 我们要完了

translation.en: No! [screaming]
That was amazing.
What? Uh--
Amazing? Me?
-Yeah. -You thought I was…
-Thank you, Joel. -Yeah?
Yeah, well, I would've done it different, but… you did all right.
translation.zh: 是的 我会用不一样的方法但你做得很好

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
Sorry. Yeah, just…
That's looking better. Take care of it.
translation.zh: 看起来好多了 小心点

translation.en: -[Rose] Bye now. -Bye, guys.
-Can you move this? Yeah. -[Joel] Aimee.
-Hey. -Hey. Um…
I gotta get back to my colony, see if they're okay.
translation.zh: 我得回我的避难所了我要确保他们没事

translation.en: Right, yeah. Yeah.
Some friends of mine told me that there's a place in the mountains,
translation.zh: 有些朋友告诉我 山区里有个地方

translation.en: I guess, that's safe from the monsters.
So maybe we'll all head there.
translation.zh: 所以也许我们都会去那里

translation.en: Um, it was really cool to just-- to see you in action,
translation.zh: 看见你和他们打斗 照顾这些人…

translation.en: and… I don't know, how you take care of all these people, and then…
translation.zh: 感觉你很了不起 我就…

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm so glad you came.
I gotta go.
I'm worried about 'em.
Yeah.
But I had something for you. Um…
[Aimee] Oh, my God.
Crocodile Carl?
-Oh, my God. -I know. [chuckles]
Thought you should have him back finally.
Here, uh…
-No, I can't take that. You need it. -No, no, no.
translation.zh: -不 我不能拿 你需要这个-不

translation.en: I want you to take it. It'd mean a lot to me.
translation.zh: 我想要你拿着 这对我来说意义重大

translation.en: Really, take it. Um…
I got it all up here, anyway. So I can always make copies.
translation.zh: 反正都在我脑子里了我随时可以再画

translation.en: Thanks for inspiring me to…
take this trip.
It's the best decision I ever made.
translation.zh: 这是我做过的最正确的决定

translation.en: All right, uh, I'm gonna go.
-Yeah. -Boy, come on!
-Uh, be careful. -Yeah, you, too.
-Bye, Aimee. -Bye.
That was…
-Great. -Yeah.
I'll come find you.
You better.
Okay.
[Joel] My name is Joel Dawson.
I'm 24 years old, and I survived seven days on the surface.
translation.zh: 我24岁了 我在地表活了七天

translation.en: Twice, actually.
-Joel? -Joel?
-[chattering, gasping] -You guys! Hey!
-Oh, my God! -Hey, hey, hey!
I'm alive because of the generosity of a few strangers
translation.zh: 我活着多亏了一些陌生人的慷慨相助

translation.en: and the kindness of a great dog.
translation.zh: 还有一只很棒的狗狗的善意

translation.en: My colony and I are headed to the mountains.
translation.zh: 我的避难所室友和我要朝山区进发了

translation.en: There's supposed to be less monsters there.
And don't get me wrong. The surface is a dangerous place.
translation.zh: 别理解错了 地表是个很危险的地方

translation.en: But I don't think hiding underground is the answer anymore.
translation.zh: 但是我觉得躲在地下不是解决办法

translation.en: There is a great big, beautiful, inspiring world out there.
translation.zh: 外面是一个伟大、美好、精彩的世界

translation.en: [on radio] And I know you think it might be impossible, but it's not.
translation.zh: 我明白你们觉得这可能无法实现但这是可以实现的

translation.en: If I can survive out here, anybody can.
translation.zh: 如果我能在地表活下去任何一个人都可以

translation.en: It's like a good friend once told me.
translation.zh: 就像有个好朋友告诉我的

translation.en: Good instincts are earned by making mistakes.
translation.zh: 准确的直觉是通过犯错获得的

translation.en: If you're lucky enough to survive a few mistakes,
translation.zh: 如果你足够幸运能在几次错误后活下来

translation.en: you're gonna do all right out here.
translation.zh: 那你就能在地表如鱼得水

translation.en: In this recording, you'll find everything I know about our new world.
translation.zh: 在这段录音中 你会听到我了解到的关于新世界的一切

translation.en: Most of this I had to learn the hard way.
translation.zh: 大多数情况下我都是吃了苦头才学会

translation.en: Hopefully, it'll make your way a little easier.
translation.zh: 希望这会让你们轻松些

translation.en: So, crank open that hatch.
Okay, come on.
[Joel] Breathe some fresh air. Go. Live your life.
translation.zh: 呼吸新鲜空气 去吧 好好生活

translation.en: It won't be easy, but it'll be worth it.
translation.zh: 这并不容易 但却值得

translation.en: I traveled 85 miles to find that what I'd been missing below ground for seven years
translation.zh: 跋涉了137公里我才发现七年来我在地下错过的东西

translation.en: was right above my head this whole time.
translation.zh: 原来一直就在我的头顶上

translation.en: And it's incredible.
Oh, and one last thing. Don't settle.
translation.zh: 还有最后一件事 别随遇而安

translation.en: You don't have to. Not even at the end of the world.
translation.zh: 你不用这样 即使到了世界末日

translation.en: Signing off,
translation.zh: （《怪物末日生存指南卷二》） 完毕

translation.en: Joel Dawson.
[Minnow] "Don't settle"? That's my line.
translation.zh: “别随遇而安？” 那是我说的

translation.en: It's a long journey, kid. I hope you know what you're doing.
translation.zh: 长路漫漫 小子我希望你知道自己在做什么

translation.en: [Minnow] He definitely doesn't. Snow Spiders will probably get him.
translation.zh: 他绝对不知道雪蜘蛛可能会抓到他

translation.en: -[Clyde] That's not a good way to go. -[Minnow] They will tear him apart.
translation.zh: -这可不太好-它们会把他大卸八块的

translation.en: -[Clyde] Nah, he'll figure it out. -[Minnow] Possibly.
translation.zh: -不 他会逢凶化吉的-可能吧
